      public void testQRCode_DataStringGeneration()
      Test: QR data string should match expected deep link structure. Verifies: deep link is formed correctly eventId is correctly injected into string

    • testRegistrationPeriod_Validation

      public void testRegistrationPeriod_Validation()
      Test: Registration period must have start less than end. Verifies: date comparison logic is valid organizer cannot create invalid registration window

    • testWaitingList_CapacityCheck_Allowed

      public void testWaitingList_CapacityCheck_Allowed()
      Test: Registration period must have start less than end. Verifies: date comparison logic is valid organizer cannot create invalid registration window

    • testWaitingList_CapacityCheck_Denied

      public void testWaitingList_CapacityCheck_Denied()
      Test: Waitlist capacity check should deny join when full. Verifies: size >= maxSpots prevents joining organizer capacity rule is respected

    • testListFiltration_Logic

      public void testListFiltration_Logic()
      Test: Organizer separates waiting/selected lists properly. Verifies: list independence events are categorized into correct lists

    • testCSVExport_Formatting

      public void testCSVExport_Formatting()
      Test: CSV export should format enrolled entrants correctly. Verifies: CSV header exists each entry produces "eventId,userId" multiple rows handled correctly

    • exportCsv_includesHeaderAndAllEnrolledEntrants

      public void exportCsv_includesHeaderAndAllEnrolledEntrants()
      Verifies that the CSV export includes the header row and one data row for each enrolled entrant, with all fields present.

    • notificationPreferenceBlocksOrAllowsAlerts

      public void notificationPreferenceBlocksOrAllowsAlerts()
      Verifies that notification preferences correctly prevent alerts when disabled and allow all alerts when enabled.

    • removeOrganizer_removesOnlyTargetOrganizer

      public void removeOrganizer_removesOnlyTargetOrganizer()
      Verifies that removing an organizer by ID only removes the targeted organizer and leaves all other organizers unchanged.
